title: When your harmless Meme post causes a flame war in the comments..
body:
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/whid1.gif

Can't we just appreciate Yasuo getting destroyed?

replies.body: Could you link the post for all the lazy people here?

[Here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/QQK0EjMu-whod-win-a-highly-trained-samurai-with-years-of-experience-or-two-rusty-tin-cans) you go lazy people.

Edit: Damn, half the comments were deleted.  You can still get the general gist of the conversation though.

i just had the time of my life reading These comments.....

how can someone get this butthurt and serious over an Insider joke!? i can't understand it!!

i Need mah boi bill nye to explain me this! 

https://images-cdn.9gag.com/photo/aDowN97_460s.jpg

https://img.wonkette.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/nye-bullshit-smaller.gif

he ain't getting destroyed tho

he's getting fair nerfs (imo)
I was referring to that flashy Hook in that 13 minute ranked game we had.
I don't know why r/Yasuomains are losing their shit. It's nerfing 2 of Yasuo's significant gameplay issues (ridiculous level 2) and will reduce his banrate.

it doesn't really matter

those nerfs are needed to balance yasuo as his early game is not the early game of a hyper carry

if he's weak he's going to get buffed

What have you done?

.............

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/196/367/c6c.gif
I'm triggered, that's what.

Like a golden apple eventually causing a full scale war in the mortal world,  the use of a word spirals into a 60+ comment flame war.

Quite stupid really.
Aw don't feel bad. You get extra views in the main thread that way. :^)
You did what you had too.  War makes Monsters of us all
